channel.title: help about bingo'ing
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "help about bingo'ing" - can't bingo anyone!

item.title: Re: help about bingo'ing
item.content:encoded:
thanks i tought it's good if their level will be very low.
thanks you very much!

item.title: Re: help about bingo'ing
item.content:encoded:
The tracking difficulty is based on this formula:

| (Your Level - Their Level) | * 2

So if your level is 20 and theirs is 60, when you track them, it will be 80 difficulty (40*2).

Try to track people close to your level.

item.title: help about bingo'ing
item.content:encoded:
i can't track anyone cause its extremly hard!it's difficulty is almost 80 and success almost 20.then how could i track anyone?
i tried in 2 or three different villages and it was not much difference between it's difficulty.
